name: Chiikawa Funbaruzu (Chiikawa)
description:
Chiikawa are making their debut as Plush 'Funbaruzu' that help you with your hunched back by wedging between your desk and stomach!
With Chiikawa, you might be able to work or study harder than usual♪
They are the perfect size to fit into business Bag or totes Bag, so you can be with Chiikawa not only at your office desk but also when you're out and about.
They assist your hunched back in various places. They will become an important partner that supports you during work or study.

To prevent dropping 'Funbaruzu', by firmly wedging them between your desk and stomach, your spine naturally straightens, leading to a good posture.
Even if you tend to hunch, you can quickly change to a sharp spine.
Inside Plush, there is a heart-shaped cushion that supports your tendency to lean forward during long desk work, reducing fatigue during work or study. 

Size (approx.): H190×W130×D130mm
Weight (approx.): 165g
Material: Polyester
Manufacturing location: China
vendor: ドリームズ

name: Chiikawa Always Together, Support Me! Talking Chiikawa
description:
From “Chiikawa”, a Plush where you can hear the voice of Chiikawa is here!
When you feed it, it eats with a “mogu mogu” sound, sings when you pet its head, sleeps with a “munya munya” sound when you put it to sleep, and adorably reacts with “iya!” when shaken up and down.
Also comes with a sachet and food parts.

【Pre-release】The release date for this product is August 5, 2023 (Saturday). It will be shipped after the release date, so please understand in advance.

It recognizes 14 words and responds with Hachiware based on the words spoken to it.
